strings.About-BuiltBy: GitKraken is built by Axosoft in sunny Scottsdale, AZ
strings.About-OpenSource: It uses some fine open source projects:
strings.About-Libgit2License: GitKraken uses the libgit2 library via NodeGit under the GNU public license with a linking exception

strings.Registration-ProLicenseExpiredBody1: Your GitKraken license has expired. Please renew your subscription to continue using GitKraken.
strings.Registration-StudentLicenseExpiredBody1-: Your GitKraken student license has expired. If you are still a student, you can regain your license by renewing your GitHub student pack, then restarting GitKraken.
Otherwise, please subscribe to continue using GitKraken.
strings.Registration-ProLicenseExpiredBody2-1: You are now using the free version of GitKraken. The ability to open private repos, the merge conflict editor, Profiles, and the GitHub Enterprise, GitLab Self-Managed, Bitbucket Server, and Azure DevOps integrations have been disabled.

strings.Profile-Description: GitKraken uses profiles to store your application preferences as well as git config information. The preferences you set after installing are set as your default profile. As a GitKraken Pro user, you can create additional profiles and quickly switch between for your different projects, work environments, etc.
strings.Profile-RequiresPro: Adding or switching profiles requires Pro, click here to upgrade
strings.Profile-Unlock: Unlock profile switching by upgrading to Pro
strings.Profile-SyncChanges: Keep my .gitconfig updated with my GitKraken Profile preferences
strings.Profile-SyncChangesSub: When checked, GitKraken will update your global .gitconfig to match GitKraken Preferences, including commit author name and email, and any GPG settings.
strings.PullRequestPanel-AzureDevopsEditPullRequ: Your pull request title and/or description will not be transferred to AzureDevops if you choose to Edit on AzureDevops
strings.PullRequestPanel-GitHubEditPullRequestWa: Your pull request reviewers will not be transferred to GitHub if you choose to Edit on GitHub
strings.ShPath-ConfirmPath: This repo needs sh to run GitHooks. Is {0} the path to your sh?

strings.CommitDetailPanel-UnsupportedRebaseMessa: GitKraken has limited functionality when another application is performing a rebase
strings.Merge-AutoResolved: Merge tool automatically resolved your conflict
strings.Merge-PremiumMergeDescription: Upgrade GitKraken and further simplify merge conflict resolution with the ability to directly edit the output without ever leaving the application.
strings.OpenRepo-AddProjectFolderTooltip: Add a folder in which you keep multiple repositories, so GitKraken can help you open them quickly

strings.InitRepo-GitIgnoreTypeaheadPlaceholder: Start typing to search for templates
strings.GeneralPreferences-AutoFetchIntervalHelp: In minutes, between 0 and 60 (0 disables auto-fetch). Fetches all visible remotes.
strings.GeneralPreferences-AutoFetchIntervalWarn: If you have many visible remotes, this may impact performance.
If you have many visible remotes, this may impact performance. LFS objects will not be automatically fetched.
strings.GeneralPreferences-CustomTerminalCmdHelp: Command to run to open a new terminal window. The keyword %d will be replaced with repository path
strings.GeneralPreferences-UseSameDiffToolHelp: Use the configured merge tool for displaying diffs
strings.GeneralPreferences-MergeToolHelp: (Optional) Set the application to use for solving merge conflict
strings.GeneralPreferences-OptIntoAnalytics: Send usage data about GitKraken to Axosoft
strings.GeneralPreferences-OptIntoBugReporting: Send bug reports about GitKraken to Axosoft
strings.GeneralPreferences-WindowsShPathLocation:
Pointing to sh.exe is only required if you're using Git hooks.
sh.exe can be found wherever you've installed Git for Windows,
which is typically in Program Files\Git\bin.
If you can't find it, you may need to install Git for Windows.
strings.SSHConfig-GenerateNewKeyHelp: This will create new keys and configure GitKraken to use them
strings.Authentication-NoCredentialsToRemove: GitKraken has no stored credentials to remove

strings.Services-GenerateAndCopySSHKey: Generate SSH key and copy to clipboard
strings.Services-Info: Set up SSH and stay logged in to streamline your experience. GitKraken can even use a different SSH key for each service.
strings.Services-LeaveBlank: We recommend leaving this field blank.
strings.Services-PersonalAccessTokenTooltip: GitKraken can use a personal access token to connect to your enterprise server and streamline operations in-app. Click the to learn how.
strings.Services-ServiceConnectionSuccessfulMess: GitKraken will help you find stuff on {0} when cloning or adding remotes. We'll also use your SSH Config to fetch and push; or you can set up a {0}-specific SSH key right here in the Services menu.
strings.Services-ServiceConnectionSuccessfulWith: GitKraken will help you find stuff on {0} when cloning. We'll also use your SSH Config to fetch and push; or you can set up a {0}-specific SSH key right here in the Services menu.
strings.Services-SSHKeyAdviseAdd: This key was not found on your {0} account. GitKraken can try to add the key to {0} (recommended).
strings.Services-SSHKeyAdviseInvalid: This key was not found on your {0} account. You can configure SSH settings for GitHub below.
strings.Services-SSHKeyAdviseInvalidOrAdd: This key was not found on your {0} account. GitKraken can try to add the key to {0}, or you can configure a different key below.
strings.Services-SSHKeyTitlePlaceholder: (optional) Enter a title for your new SSH key
strings.Services-SSHKeyTooltip: Use GitKraken to add an SSH key to {0}. GitKraken will use the key when interacting with {0} SSH repositories.
strings.Services-SSHKeyUnverifiable: {0} does not allow external apps to check whether public keys are registered. If your key is not being accepted by {0}, use the button below and make sure the key has been added on {1}.
strings.Services-UsingAgent: Using your System SSH Local Agent
strings.Services-UsingDefaults: Using your Default GitKraken SSH Key
strings.Services-UsingNone: No SSH settings detected. You can add an SSH Key to {0} below.

strings.GPGPreferences-GpgGenerateKeyHelp:
This will create a 4096 bit key with the name and email
 in your current profile that expires in 2 years.
This will also be set as your active signing key.
strings.ToolbarButton-DropdownMessage: Select a default board to open when clicking the Glo button on this repo
strings.SendUsFeedback-CantRespondToAllFeedback: The GitKraken team looks forward to your feedback, but please note that we are not able to respond to all feedback emails.
strings.SendUsFeedback-EmailUsYourself: Or, you can just email us yourself at
strings.ProvideFeedback-DefaultText:
Summary:

  [A brief sentence describing the issue]

Steps to Reproduce:

  1. [First Step]
  2. [Second Step]
  3. [and so on...]

Expected behavior: [What you expect to happen]

Actual behavior: [What actually happens]

strings.Error-UnableToMergeInApp: File needs an external merge tool to solve
strings.Error-UnkownFetchErrorForResource: Unknown error when trying to fetch {0}
strings.ErrorFallback-ConfirmationMessage: Your error report has been submitted. Thank you!
strings.ErrorFallback-Message: GitKraken encountered a fatal error. If you enabled bug reporting, this issue has been reported. If not, please consider sending a report.
strings.ErrorMessage-BranchNameConflictsWithDire: Could not create ref "{0}" because its name conflicts with an existing ref
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotApplyStashWhenFilesAr: Cannot apply stash while anything is staged. Stash, commit, or unstage first.
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotDeleteCheckedOutBranc: Cannot delete currently checked out branch. Switch branches first.
strings.ErrorMessage-1ConflictPreventsCheckout:
1 conflict prevents checkout.
Commit, stash, or discard your changes first.
strings.ErrorMessage-NConflictsPreventCheckout:
{0} conflicts prevent checkout.
Commit, stash, or discard your changes first.
strings.ErrorMessage-DiscardSelectionFailedWithR: Could not discard selection for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-InotifyLimitReached: File watching is disabled for this repository. Please increase your inotify limit and reopen this repository.
strings.ErrorMessage-InvalidSshKey: Configured SSH key is invalid. Please confirm that it is properly associated with your Git provider.
strings.ErrorMessage-SshKeyNotFound: SSH Key not found. Please configure one first in Preferences -> Authentication
strings.ErrorMessage-SshKeyNotSupported: Configured SSH key is in an invalid format. Please ensure that your key is valid and is an RSA-type key.
strings.ErrorMessage-MergeConflicts: There are merge conflicts that need to be resolved
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenFileCompareToolFo: Multiple files are currently selected in the Commit Panel
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenFileCompareToolWi: No file is selected in the Commit Panel or open in the merge resolution panel
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenFileCompareToolFo: More than two commits are currently selected in the graph
strings.ErrorMessage-CannotOpenRepo: Could not find a compatible repository at '{0}'.
strings.ErrorMessage-DiffToolNotFound: The configured diff tool was not found
strings.ErrorMessage-MergeToolNotFound: The configured merge tool was not found
strings.ErrorMessage-FailedToLaunchDiffTool: Could not find default diff tool "{0}" specified in git config.
strings.ErrorMessage-FailedToLaunchMergeTool: Could not find default merge tool "{0}" specified in git config.
strings.ErrorMessage-NeedUpgradedPermissions: GitKraken has even better integration with {0} and needs more permissions to continue.
strings.ErrorMessage-NoAncestorAvailableToWriteT: Cannot save to disk without an ancestor or solving the conflicts
strings.ErrorMessage-NoDiffToolSet: There is no diff tool configured in your settings
strings.ErrorMessage-NoMergeToolSet: There is no merge tool configured in your settings
strings.ErrorMessage-PullRequestRemoteNotFoundWi: Could not get pull requests for '{0}' on {1}. Double-check your remote urls and make sure you have permission to access that repository.
strings.ErrorMessage-RateLimitReset: You can begin making requests to {0} again {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-RebaseConflicts: There are rebase conflicts that need to be resolved
strings.ErrorMessage-RemoteAccessDenied: Access denied. Make sure you have access to do that action on that remote and try again.
strings.ErrorMessage-RemoteAccessDeniedOrgWarnin: If {0} is an organization on {1}, you may need to request (or grant) GitKraken access to the organization.
strings.ErrorMessage-RemoteNotFoundWithName: Could not connect to '{0}'. Double-check your remote url, then make sure you have access to do that action on that remote and try again.
strings.ErrorMessage-RemoteRefBehindRemote: Your remote branch is out of date. Please fetch {0} before pushing.
strings.ErrorMessage-ResetFailedWithReason: Could not reset for the following reason: {0}
strings.ErrorMessage-WindowsShPathNotFound: This repo has Git hooks. Using Git hooks on Windows requires sh.exe, but GitKraken couldn't find it.
strings.ErrorMessage-StageFilemodeFailedWithReas: Could not stage filemode for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-StagePathsFailedWithReason: Could not stage paths for the following reason: {0}
strings.ErrorMessage-StageSelectionFailedWithRea: Could not stage selection for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-TerminalCommandNotConfigure: There is no terminal configured in your settings. Would you like to configure your terminal now?
strings.ErrorMessage-UnableToMergeInApp: File conflict contains both text and binary parts. Use an external tool to handle this merge.
strings.ErrorMessage-UnstageFilemodeFailedWithRe: Could not unstage filemode for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-UnstagePathsFailedWithReaso: Could not unstage paths for the following reason: {0}
strings.ErrorMessage-UnstageSelectionFailedWithR: Could not unstage selection for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.ErrorMessage-UpdateDiffFailedWithReason: Could not update diffs for the following reason: {0}
strings.ErrorMessage-UpdateHunkFailedWithReason: Could not update hunk for {0} for the following reason: {1}
strings.FileSavePrompt-Detail: Any unsaved changes will be discarded.
strings.FileSavePrompt-Message: Do you want to save the changes you made to {0}?
strings.CheckoutError-CloseDetailPanel: To checkout, please save your changes and try again.
strings.MergeError-CloseDetailPanel: To merge, please save your changes and try again.
strings.RebaseError-CloseDetailPanel: To rebase, please save your changes and try again.
strings.RebaseAbortError-CloseDetailPanel: To abort the rebase, please save your changes and try again.
strings.RebaseContinueError-CloseDetailPanel: To continue the rebase, please save your changes and try again.
strings.CloseRepoError-CloseDetailPanel: To close the repo, please save your changes and try again.
strings.OpenRepoError-CloseDetailPanel: To open another repo, please save your changes and try again.
strings.DropStashError-CloseDetailPanel: To drop a stash, please save your changes and try again.
strings.CreateStashError-CloseDetailPanel: To stash, please save your changes and try again.
strings.ApplyStashError-CloseDetailPanel: To apply a stash, please save your changes and try again.
strings.TryUndoError-CloseDetailPanel: To try to redo, please save your changes and try again.
strings.TryRedoError-CloseDetailPanel: To try to undo, please save your changes and try again.
strings.Error-CloseDetailPanel: Please save your changes and try again.
strings.Editor-OverwriteContentsOnDiskQuestion: The file has been modified outside of GitKraken. Do you want to overwrite the file?
strings.Editor-OverwriteContentsOnDiskOrDiscardQ: The file has been modified outside of GitKraken. Do you want to discard your changes, or overwrite the file?
strings.SaveAndStageEditorChanges-Message: Do you want to save your changes before staging, or only stage what's already saved to the disk?
